articles.title: Apple Building Specialized Chips for Smart Glasses
articles.content: Apple is developing new chips for future devices, including smart glasses and artificial intelligence servers. Bloomberg's Mark Gurman discusses Apple's plans with Caroline Hyde and Ed Ludlow on "Bloomberg Technology."

articles.title: Sonos Interim CEO Says Company Has Turned a Corner and He Wants the Top Job
articles.content: (Bloomberg) -- Sonos Inc. interim Chief Executive Officer Tom Conrad said the audio company has “turned the corner” following setbacks caused by software issues — and that he wants to be named to the top job permanently. articles.title: Are You Missing Out on These 2 Dividend Raises From Tech Sector Powerhouses?
articles.content: One of the companies accompanied its hike with a massive new share buyback program.  Both IBM and Apple offer good reason to merit a place in an investor's portfolio.  One of the companies even accompanied this with a new, jumbo-sized share buyback program.
